channel.title: Flamescape V1 - First Release - 530+ downloadS - 2000+ ViewS
channel.description:
Hello.
This is my first server, so take it easy on me.
[code] CREDITS
silabgarza me Everyone who helped me in server help :p
[/code]
Features - Not many >.< Wyvern Jad Wishing Well New Theiving New Shops New Pk Area Edge bank - Firewalled :P Summoning
Commands - [code] armorhelp
testskull pest
gamecount eat rep pc gopc gamecount alert lupdate pnpc giveadmin givemod giveowner Demote testminigame tz noclip xrichie xteleall pickup starter xteletome xteleto god godoff modzone home client agility train wyvern dag defender jad wc pk dragons kqueen fish 3rdage farm slayer smith mypk gsmini membership suggest master clicks ipban banuser unban macrowarn getpass setlvls [/code]
Pictures -
[center]HomE [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/home.jpg[/img]
Pk Area [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/flamepk.jpg[/img]
Theiving [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/theive-2.jpg[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/servershops-1.jpg[/img]
Wyvern [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/wyverm.jpg[/img]
Wishing Well [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/well.jpg[/img]
Thanks again silabgarza :)
DOWNLOAD LINK - http://uppit.com/1DLV40 [/center]

item.title: Flamescape V1 - First Release - 530+ downloadS - 2000+ ViewS
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Tatertot3312, post:21, topic:250599”]Okay ive been playing on your server for almost an hr and here are somethings that i have to suggest:

[ul][li]Herblore, and Mining skill/skillcape/hood[/li]
[li]Farming skill cape/hood [/li]
[li]have the river troll fight back on mini game[/li]
[li]You can use the wishing well every 3mins not 10[/li]
[li]instead of chunks of ice at the pk just have a sign of some sort[/li]
[li]Why are there factory worker dwarves in the pk area[/li]
[li]Make it so Jad doesnt Auto-Attack[/li]
[li]Fix Vengence[/li]
[li]add NPC’s to tazahar[/li]
[li]fix ::qtrain[/li]
[li]fix ::tztrain[/li]
[li]Make it so you can tele[/li]
[li]SKILLCAPE EMOTES![/li]
[li]quests[/li]
[li]have a specific shop area instead of spread out across Edgeville[/li]
[li]make it so Kalphite Queen doesnt fight as soon as tele to her like Jad[/li]
[li]Less flames more walls. dont rid of tho because of server name just tone it down a little[/li][/ul]

Thats just some little easy things to fix. But theyre just suggestions dont take it to heart. Personally I think Project Czar base is overused but its great if your new and not yet a good coder. Also I wouldnt use a 508(HD) yet because they are very unstable. wait like 1 month or 2 they will hopefully be somewhat stable then. If were lucky :P[/quote]

[ul][li]Herblore, and Mining skill/skillcape/hood[/li][/ul]
They are there

[ul][li]Farming skill cape/hood [/li][/ul]
Meh, forgot that one >.<

[ul][li]have the river troll fight back on mini game[/li][/ul]
Do that yourself

[ul][li]You can use the wishing well every 3mins not 10[/li][/ul]
Change it yourself,. u can get 700m drops from there, ur economy will get messed if its 3min

[ul][li]instead of chunks of ice at the pk just have a sign of some sort[/li][/ul]
errr? its fire?

[ul][li]Why are there factory worker dwarves in the pk area[/li][/ul]
use the client, www.sgclient.tk

[ul][li]Make it so Jad doesnt Auto-Attack[/li][/ul]
Do that yourself

[ul][li]Fix Vengence[/li][/ul]
It works?

[ul][li]add NPC’s to tazahar[/li][/ul]
Coming in v2

[ul][li]fix ::qtrain[/li][/ul]
Coming in V2

[ul][li]fix ::tztrain[/li][/ul]
Coming in V2

[ul][li]Make it so you can tele[/li][/ul]
Fix that yourselfs

[ul][li]SKILLCAPE EMOTES![/li][/ul]
::cape

[ul][li]quests[/li][/ul]
I cbf

[ul][li]have a specific shop area instead of spread out across Edgeville[/li][/ul]
shops next to bank are skiller, the others arent.

[ul][li]make it so Kalphite Queen doesnt fight as soon as tele to her like Jad[/li][/ul]
No thanks

[ul][li]Less flames more walls. dont rid of tho because of server name just tone it down a little[/li][/ul]
…?
[/list]

Read full topic

item.title: Flamescape V1 - First Release - 530+ downloadS - 2000+ ViewS
item.dc:creator: @Tatertot3312 Tatertot3312
item.description:
@Tatertot3312 wrote:

Okay ive been playing on your server for almost an hr and here are somethings that i have to suggest:

[ul][li]Herblore, and Mining skill/skillcape/hood[/li]
[li]Farming skill cape/hood [/li]
[li]have the river troll fight back on mini game[/li]
[li]You can use the wishing well every 3mins not 10[/li]
[li]instead of chunks of ice at the pk just have a sign of some sort[/li]
[li]Why are there factory worker dwarves in the pk area[/li]
[li]Make it so Jad doesnt Auto-Attack[/li]
[li]Fix Vengence[/li]
[li]add NPC’s to tazahar[/li]
[li]fix ::qtrain[/li]
[li]fix ::tztrain[/li]
[li]Make it so you can tele[/li]
[li]SKILLCAPE EMOTES![/li]
[li]quests[/li]
[li]have a specific shop area instead of spread out across Edgeville[/li]
[li]make it so Kalphite Queen doesnt fight as soon as tele to her like Jad[/li]
[li]Less flames more walls. dont rid of tho because of server name just tone it down a little[/li][/ul]

Thats just some little easy things to fix. But theyre just suggestions dont take it to heart. Personally I think Project Czar base is overused but its great if your new and not yet a good coder. Also I wouldnt use a 508(HD) yet because they are very unstable. wait like 1 month or 2 they will hopefully be somewhat stable then. If were lucky

Read full topic

item.title: Flamescape V1 - First Release - 530+ downloadS - 2000+ ViewS
item.dc:creator: @Tatertot3312 Tatertot3312
item.description:
@Tatertot3312 wrote:

This is a great 1st server. I downloaded and sure it could use a lil work but who cares its your 1st source release. You learn by comments and critism. Looking forward to seeing a V2 with maybe a [font=Verdana]littlle less flames and a little more things to do[/font], sure the flames look cool, but there’s a point to where there is to much…

Great Job!
8.6/10 ;D

Read full topic
